title: Carrabis Christmas Special, Part 2
description:
The Carrabis Christmas Special continues. Kirk, Steve, and Jared talk with Jeff D. Lowe about their upcoming debut on The Dozens trivia show. Intern Justin joins the show to test the guys' knowledge of sports, politics, and pop culture. Carrabis plays coy about his new love interest / maternal fashion adviser. The show returns January 4th with Patreon sensation Michael Geary. Follow us at Twitter.com/kirkminshow for updates over the holiday break.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
